verse: लीला प्रेम्णा प्रियाधिक्यं माधुर्यं वेणु-रूपयोः । इत्य् असाधारणं प्रोक्तं गोविन्दस्य चतुष्टयम् (भ.र.सि.)

terms.वेणु: रूपयोः - of the form of the flute

meaning: Meaning:This verse is from the Brahma Sutras and it describes the extraordinary fourfold qualities of Lord Govinda (Lord Krishna). It states that Govinda's playful activities, accompanied by greater affection and sweetness, which are embodied by the sound and form of His divine flute, are exceptional and unique.
